co2-calculation: Annahme wie Rapssamen: 1 TJ getrocknete Rapssamen verursachen 48223 kg CO2äq. 1 TJ = 238845896 kcal. 1 kg of rapesees equals 4750 kcal. 50238 kg rapeseeds are 1 TJ. 1 kg of rapseeds causes 48223/50238 = 0.96 kg CO2äq
references: 1. Probas-Datebank Raps-Körner-DE-2010 (getrocknet): http://www.probas.umweltbundesamt.de/php/volltextsuche.php?prozessid={BFC23BFE-C04A-4597-88B4-EFDDEA937B76}&step=42. Grau et al., 2013 Environmental life cycle assesment of rapeseed straight vegetable oil as self-supply agricultural biofuel. Renewable Energy Vol. 50 -> Table 1 page 143 (1kg rapeseed = 4750 kcal)
name: Dillsamen
